item.description:
ANOTHER SPECTACULAR HAPPY HOUR WITH

THE IRA

FRIDAY NIGHT ( Yea- No work the next day!!)

LET’S GET HAPPY and Meet Other Singles!!


WHEN: September 17. Friday 5:30 P.M.
WHERE: ANGELICO RESTAURANT 40 Glastonbury Boulevard
Glastonbury, CT 06033. http://angelicosotb.c... (860) 659-9300.
(Very easy to find, so please do not panic)

DETAILS/SMALL PRINT

How should I describe Angelico’s on the Boulevard?

There words:

Pairing global cuisine with a uniquely elegant dining atmosphere. Our food is savory, approachable and made with only the finest and freshest ingredients including high-quality meats, seafood and vegetables. Classic menu favorites include roast prime rib of beef, steak frites, bouillabaisse, and cassoulet as well as an outstanding wine list with an ever-changing international selection. Stop by and experience our uniquely designed menu, exquisite food, and polished service in a warm and intimate setting.

My Words:

AWESOME, FRIENDLY, FUNKY, GREAT FOOD AND AND MOUTHWATERING COCKTAILS. HAPPY HOUR SPECIALS ROCK THE HOUSE!!!! (And it is not EXPENSIVE)

The Above Specials are till 7:30PM. We will have our own area in the Funky Bar Reserved for The Ira’s Singles Group. We can stay as late as we want!!!

As always, personal introductions to all, name tags, and a nice warm and inviting venue for an easy way to meet new people, and to come alone, but, not feel alone!!

R.S.V.P: Please let me know if you are joining on or before Wednesday, September 15, so I may keep the Restaurant informed how many Happy Hour Playful folks are joining. If you say yes, please do come, if you change your mind, please let me know. This is only fair to me and the Restaurant. Thank you.

R.S.V.P: Mistrchrming@aol.com. Subject Line, September 17 Happy Hour. Questions: Ira- 860-604-5792. (A $3.00 Suggested Donation at door)

WANT TO SEE PICTURES OF THE PAST EVENTS, AND A LISTING OF NEW FORTHCOMING SINGLES EVENTS? PLEASE SEE BELOW.

Click and Paste: http://www.theirassin... Under Photo Gallery Tab


(How very Yummy and Devine for sure)


Happy Hour Appetizers

Buffalo Chicken Dip Chicken, Jack cheese, ranch sauce & chips - $3 Raw Bar Cocktail Shrimp -$2 ea Clams on half shell with cocktail sauce. - $1 ea Bruschetta Duet Tomato, basil, goat cheese & Broccoli rabe, chorizo, garlic & gorgonzola - $3 Quesadilla Chicken quesadilla with sour cream jalapeño. - $3 Pesto Tart Pesto, oven roasted tomatoes, & fresh mozzarella. - $3 Mussels Mussels in sake ginger, garlic, & scallions. - $3 Calamari Calamari, marinara sauce. - $3
Tempura Vegetables - $3 Sweet Potato Fries - $3 French Fries - $2 Home Made Kettle Chips - $3

(Save room for Dinner. See below for Fantastic Dinner Offerings)

Yummy Dinner Offerings:
Lemon Sage Chicken
Half roasted chicken served with butternut squash mash,
sautéed spinach & fresh herb jus
15.95
Barbecue Salmon
Pan seared & served with rice, Sierra Nevada
black beans, tomatillo salsa & julienne vegetables
18.95
Yellowfin Tuna
Pepper crusted & seared rare with wasabi risotto,
gingered broccoli rabe in a ginger-soy beurre blanc
18.95
Scallops Rosette
Pan seared, served with chive mashed potatoes,
carrot purée & a raspberry wine sauce
17.95
Prime Rib
Slow roasted & served with sour cream mashed
potatoes, natural jus & julienne vegetables
16oz 18.95 / 20oz 23.95
Hanger Steak au Poivre
Butcher’s steak with sour cream & chive potato
purée, French beans & glazed carrots
18.95
Pan Seared Filet Mignon
Served with French Beans, chive mashed potatoes,
demi glace & hollandaise sauce
23.95
Sirloin Steak & Frites
With Bérnaise sauce, crispy pommes frites
& a sautéed vegetable medley
20.95
Chicken Fano
Roulade of chicken breast, proscuitto,
mozzarella & broccoli rabe, served over gnocchi,
garlic confit, cherry tomatoes
& white truffle sauce
15.95






Dinner Entrees (cont)

Orechiette Tri Colore
Small ear-shaped pasta with tomatoes, garlic,
broccoli rabe, kalamata olives & olive oil
12.95
Linguini Fra Diavolo
Served with Shrimp, scallops & clams
in a spicy arribiatta sauce
18.95
Rigatoni al Forno
Sausage & portobello mushrooms in a rosemary
tomato sauce, topped with mozzarella
& finished in the oven
14.95
Baked Lasagna
Wide noodles, tomatoes, Italian meat sauce,
ricotta & mozzarella cheese, fresh basil,
oregano & parsley
12.95
Sambal Shrimp & Risotto
Sautéed shrimp, creamy saffron risotto,
English peas, tomatoes & Asiago cheese
18.95
Paella
Mussels, chicken, clams, shrimp, chorizo sausage & rice cooked in a spicy seafood & chicken broth
17.95
Bouillabaisse
Clams, mussels, scallops, salmon & spinach
in seafood broth with a saffron rouille crouton
finished with pastis & butter
17.95
Veal Scaloppini
Sautéed Veal medallions with,
mushroom, scallions & Marscapone cheese filled crêpes,
julienne vegetables and a three day veal sauce
20.95
Grilled Pork Chops
Topped caramelized apples & onions, finished with a
classic charcuterie sauce over julienne vegetables &
chive mashed potatoes
15.95
item.how_to_find_us: Large Group of Singles Having Fun and Smiling. Host /Hostess will direct you to our exclusive area
item.name: The Ira- Spectacular Happy Hour This Friday. Meet Other Singles!!!
